column2: you really can't go wrong on their extensive menu of tapas. I always opt for the bacon wrapped dates which are crispy
column4: chewy and so yummy.  The Burratta is phenomenal
column5: as is the goat cheese in tomato sauce.  The shrimp with lemon and red pepper is another favorite
column6: as is the brussels sprouts salad which has manchego cheese and a yummy citrus dressing.
